 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּד‎</span> **verb** ==move to and fro, wander, flutter==, shew grief (Late Hebrew ***id.*** (rare); Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּד‎</span>, ***shake, move to and fro, be disturbed, agitated***; Biblical Aramaic ***flee*** (see below); Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***waver, totter***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָד‎</span> so read for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵד‎</span> [[Isa.17.11|Isa 17:11]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#RV|RV]]; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָ֫דוּ‎</span> [[Jer.50.3|Jer 50:3]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנוּד‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.15|1Kgs 14:15]] + 3 t.; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנוּד‎</span> [[Jer.4.1|Jer 4:1]] jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנֹד‎</span> [[Jer.16.5|Jer 16:5]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּנֻ֫דוּ‎</span> [[Job.42.11|Job 42:11]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנֻ֫דוּ‎</span> [[Jer.22.10|Jer 22:10]] ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָנ֫וּדִי‎</span> [[Ps.11.1|Ps 11:1]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נודו‎</span>); masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֻ֫דוּ‎</span> [[Jer.48.17|Jer 48:17]] + 2 t. Jeremiah; ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּד‎</span> [[Job.2.11|Job 2:11]] + 2 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָד‎</span> [[Gen.4.12|Gen 4:12]]; [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] — 

**1. a.** ***move to and fro, wander*** aimlessly, as fugitive, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָע וָנָד‎</span> [[Gen.4.12|Gen 4:12]]; [[Gen.4.14|Gen 4:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Jer.4.1|Jer 4:1]] ([[BDB#Gie|Gie]], as apodosis, so [[BDB#RV|RV]]; but [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]], as protasis, ***if thou wanderest not*** [morally], and swearest, etc., — [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] reading with [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁקוציך‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפִּיךָ וּמִפָּנַי לא תנוד‎</span>; [[BDB#Co|Co]] strike out v[[Jer.4.1|Jer 4:1]] v[[Jer.4.2|Jer 4:2]]); ***take flight*** (perhaps metaplastic form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נדד‎</span> q. v.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֻסוּ נֻּדוּ מְאֹד‎</span> [[Jer.49.30|Jer 49:30]] (on daghesh see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:20g»§ 20g</sup>), of harvest [[Isa.17.21|Isa 17:21]] i.e. be destroyed, in figure (see above); [[Jer.50.3|Jer 50:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלך‎</span>), v[[Jer.50.8|Jer 50:8]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּוֺךְ‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצא‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***flutter***, of bird [[Prov.26.2|Prov 26:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּף‎</span>); figurative of soul [[Ps.11.1|Ps 11:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***waver, wave, shake***, of reed [[1Kgs.14.15|1Kgs 14:15]] (simile of smitten Israel). 

**2.** ***shew grief*** (i. e. by shaking or nodding head), usually followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***lament*** for the dead (Josiah) [[Jer.22.10|Jer 22:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בכה‎</span>), for Jerusalem [[Jer.15.5|Jer 15:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חמל‎</span>), [[Jer.16.5|Jer 16:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספד‎</span>), [[Isa.51.19|Isa 51:19]] for Nineveh [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]] Moab [[Jer.48.17|Jer 48:17]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***condole, shew sympathy*** with [[Job.2.11|Job 2:11]]; [[Job.42.11|Job 42:11]] absolute [[Ps.69.21|Ps 69:21]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיד‎</span> [[Jer.18.16|Jer 18:16]] 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנִדֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.36.12|Ps 36:12]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲנִידֵ֑מוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.59.12|Ps 59:12]] (so read for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הורידמו‎</span> [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Proph. Chald, xlviii.</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[2Sam.15.20|2Sam 15:20]]</sup> compare [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>critical note</sup> [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]); ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהָנִיד‎</span> [[2Kgs.21.8|2Kgs 21:8]] — 

**1.** ***cause to wander*** aimlessly, as fugitives, with accusative of person [[Ps.36.12|Ps 36:12]]; [[Ps.59.12|Ps 59:12]] (see above), followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגֶל‎</span> [[2Kgs.21.8|2Kgs 21:8]]. 

**2.** ***make a wagging, wag*** with the head, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּראֹשׁ‎</span> [[Jer.18.16|Jer 18:16]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּקוֺץ מֻנָֿד‎</span> [[2Sam.23.6|2Sam 23:6]] and the worthless, ***like briers made to flutter*** (tossed away) are they (text dubious; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מדבר‎</span>). **Hithpo\`lel** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְנוֺדֲדָה‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.24.20|Isa 24:20]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְנוֺדָ֑ד‎</span> [[Jer.48.27|Jer 48:27]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנוֺדֵד‎</span> [[Jer.31.18|Jer 31:18]] — 

**1.** ***move oneself to and fro, sway, totter***, [[Isa.24.20|Isa 24:20]] (of earth). 

**2.** ***shake oneself***, in excitement [[Jer.48.27|Jer 48:27]] (perhaps of scorn = ***wag*** the head, as Hiph\`il [[Jer.18.16|Jer 18:16]] compare [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#RV|RV]]). 

**3.** ***bemoan oneself*** (compare **Qal 2**), [[Jer.31.18|Jer 31:18]] (the lament follows in oratio recta [direct speech]).
